label: Kraken Flow
info:
HTTP Request = http://KRAKEN_IP:8081/DOA_value.html
Will broadcast via ATAK default multicast address
If no Lat/Long then it drops the marker to a default location

name: Parse
func:
var rawData = msg.payload.split(','); // Split the raw data by comma
var parsedData = {
    epochTime: parseInt(rawData[0]),
    maxDOAAngle: parseFloat(rawData[1]),
    confidenceValue: parseFloat(rawData[2]),
    rssiPower: parseFloat(rawData[3]),
    channelFrequency: parseInt(rawData[4]),
    antennaArray: rawData[5],
    latency: parseInt(rawData[6]),
    stationID: rawData[7],
    latitude: parseFloat(rawData[8]),
    longitude: parseFloat(rawData[9]),
    gpsHeading: parseFloat(rawData[10]),
    compassHeading: parseFloat(rawData[11]),
    mainHeadingSensor: rawData[12]
};

msg.payload = parsedData; // Replace the payload with the parsed data
return msg;

name: Marker
KrakenDOANodePort
